WrittenContract.title: Written Contract
WrittenContract.description: The primary agreement signed by both parties. Essential for contracts involving immovable property or administrative bodies.

NoticeofDefault.title: Notice of Default (Warning Letter)
NoticeofDefault.description: A registered letter or legal notice sent to the defaulting party demanding performance, essential for claiming damages.

PaymentReceipt.title: Payment Receipt / Bank Advice
PaymentReceipt.description: Documentary proof of money transferred (loan disbursement) or payments made (performance).

DeliveryNote.title: Delivery Note (Model 19/22)
DeliveryNote.description: Proof that goods were actually delivered to and received by the buyer.

AdmissionofDebt.title: Admission of Debt
AdmissionofDebt.description: A specific written document where the debtor acknowledges the sum owed.

AuditReport.title: Audit Report
AuditReport.description: A financial report detailing outstanding balances, often required in complex B2B disputes.

TitleDeed.title: Title Deed (Librec/Carta)
TitleDeed.description: The primary certificate of holding rights/ownership for urban houses and land.

SitePlan.title: Site Plan
SitePlan.description: Official technical map showing the coordinates, boundaries, and area of the plot.

LeaseAgreement.title: Lease Agreement
LeaseAgreement.description: Contract between the citizen and the City Administration defining the lease period and rights.

ConstructionPermit.title: Construction Permit
ConstructionPermit.description: Official authorization to build, proving legality of the structure.

TaxLandRentReceipts.title: Tax/Land Rent Receipts
TaxLandRentReceipts.description: Proof of continuous payment of obligations, used to evidence continuous possession.

KebeleConfirmation.title: Kebele Confirmation
KebeleConfirmation.description: Letter from the local administration confirming who lives in/occupies the property.

WitnessAffidavitsNuisance.title: Witness Affidavits (Nuisance)
WitnessAffidavitsNuisance.description: Sworn statements detailing the time, duration, and severity of the disturbance (e.g., noise, smell, vibration).

PhotosVideoEvidence.title: Photos/Video Evidence
PhotosVideoEvidence.description: Visual proof of the nuisance source (e.g., pollution, excessive height of a structure).

PriorAgreementServitude.title: Prior Agreement (Servitude)
PriorAgreementServitude.description: If the servitude was created by contract, the written agreement is required.

PayrollSlip.title: Payroll Slip
PayrollSlip.description: A document detailing an employee's salary.

DismissalLetter.title: Dismissal Letter
DismissalLetter.description: A letter of dismissal from service.

GrievanceSubmission.title: Grievance Submission
GrievanceSubmission.description: A document proving a grievance was submitted.

WarningLetter.title: Warning Letter
WarningLetter.description: A warning letter issued to an employee.

CertificateofMarriage.title: Certificate of Marriage
CertificateofMarriage.description: Official certificate issued by VERA or religious/customary authority proving the existence of the marriage.

BirthCertificate.title: Birth Certificate(s)
BirthCertificate.description: Official birth records for all children involved in the dispute, proving age and parentage.

ProofofIncome.title: Proof of Income
ProofofIncome.description: Pay slips, bank statements, or tax records used to calculate maintenance (alimony) capabilities.

FamilyArbitratorsReport.title: Family Arbitrators' Report
FamilyArbitratorsReport.description: (If applicable) A record of the attempt at reconciliation by family elders/arbitrators, often required before formal litigation.

ListofCommonProperty.title: List of Common Property
ListofCommonProperty.description: An inventory document detailing assets acquired during the marriage (movable and immovable).

PoliceReportDomesticViolence.title: Police Report (Domestic Violence)
PoliceReportDomesticViolence.description: Official record of physical or emotional abuse, used as grounds for immediate dissolution or restraining orders.

SchoolFeeReceipts.title: School Fee Receipts
SchoolFeeReceipts.description: Documentary proof of educational expenses for children, used to quantify maintenance claims.

MedicalBoardCertificate.title: Medical Board Certificate
MedicalBoardCertificate.description: Evidence regarding paternity (DNA) or medical incapacity of a spouse.

CopyofDivorceJudgment.title: Copy of Divorce Judgment
CopyofDivorceJudgment.description: The prior court ruling confirming the marriage is dissolved.

ProofofInheritanceDonation.title: Proof of Inheritance/Donation
ProofofInheritanceDonation.description: Documents proving property was acquired via inheritance or donation.

Pre-maritalOwnershipDocuments.title: Pre-marital Ownership Documents
Pre-maritalOwnershipDocuments.description: Documents proving ownership of property before marriage.

JudgmentofDivorce.title: Judgment of Divorce
JudgmentofDivorce.description: The prior court ruling confirming the marriage is dissolved and allowing the property phase to commence.

PropertyValuationReport.title: Property Valuation Report
PropertyValuationReport.description: (Optional/Later Stage) A report by a certified engineer or auditor estimating the value of the assets.

TitleDeedsLibrec.title: Title Deeds / Librec
TitleDeedsLibrec.description: Official ownership certificates for immovable property (houses, land).

DeathCertificate.title: Death Certificate
DeathCertificate.description: Official certificate from VERA or municipality confirming the date and place of death.

WillTestament.title: Will (Testament)
WillTestament.description: A Public, Holographic, or Oral will documenting the deceased's wishes.

KebeleFamilyID.title: Kebele ID / Family Certificate
KebeleFamilyID.description: Official document proving the relationship between the claimant and the deceased (e.g., listing children).

InventoryofEstate.title: Inventory of Estate
InventoryofEstate.description: A detailed list of assets (houses, cars, bank accounts) left by the deceased.

WitnessAffidavitsSuccession.title: Witness Affidavits (Succession)
WitnessAffidavitsSuccession.description: Sworn statements by individuals (usually 3) confirming who the rightful heirs are.

CertificateofLiquidation.title: Certificate of Liquidation
CertificateofLiquidation.description: Document showing debts have been paid (required before final partition).

CertificateOfRegistrationEIPO.title: Certificate of Registration (EIPO)
CertificateOfRegistrationEIPO.description: Official document proving ownership of a Patent, Trademark, or registered Copyright.

ProductSampleSpecimen.title: Product Sample / Specimen
ProductSampleSpecimen.description: The physical product bearing the trademark or the technical documentation of the invention.

CeaseAndDesistLetter.title: Cease and Desist Letter
CeaseAndDesistLetter.description: Formal notice sent to the infringer demanding they stop the unlawful activity.

MarketSurveyAffidavit.title: Market Survey / Affidavit
MarketSurveyAffidavit.description: Proof demonstrating consumer confusion in the marketplace (for Trademark cases).

CustomsInspectionReport.title: Customs Inspection Report
CustomsInspectionReport.description: Official report confirming the seizure of counterfeit goods at the border.

TechnicalExpertReport.title: Technical Expert Report
TechnicalExpertReport.description: Report comparing the registered patent claims to the alleged infringing product.

IdentityCard.title: Identity Card (Kebele/National ID)
IdentityCard.description: The primary document reflecting the current (incorrect) status information.

BirthMarriageCertificateVERA.title: Birth/Marriage Certificate (VERA)
BirthMarriageCertificateVERA.description: Official civil status document requiring correction.

PublicNoticeOfAbsence.title: Public Notice of Absence
PublicNoticeOfAbsence.description: Proof that the petition for absence was published in a newspaper (Civ. Code Art. 159).

GenealogicalAffidavit.title: Genealogical Affidavit
GenealogicalAffidavit.description: Document proving the relationship to the deceased (required for Heirship Certification).

TaxAssessmentNotice.title: Tax Assessment Notice
TaxAssessmentNotice.description: The official letter from the MoR detailing the tax liability, penalties, and interest.

NoticeOfObjectionInitial.title: Notice of Objection (Initial)
NoticeOfObjectionInitial.description: The formal letter submitted by the taxpayer to the MoR/CC challenging the initial assessment.

AccountingRecords.title: Accounting Records (Ledgers, Invoices)
AccountingRecords.description: Mandatory documentation (especially for Category A) to substantiate gross income and deductions.

ImportExportDeclarationSAD.title: Import/Export Declaration (SAD)
ImportExportDeclarationSAD.description: Official customs document detailing the imported goods, value, and applicable duties.

PaymentReceiptsTaxCustoms.title: Payment Receipts (Tax/Customs)
PaymentReceiptsTaxCustoms.description: Proof of compliance, necessary for clearance or to meet the 50% deposit requirement.

ExternalAuditReport.title: External Audit Report
ExternalAuditReport.description: Report from a certified external auditor contradicting the MoR's findings.

PoliceAccidentReport.title: Police/Traffic Accident Report
PoliceAccidentReport.description: Official documentation by police detailing the time, location, parties, and preliminary findings of a traffic or civil incident.

MedicalExpenseReceipts.title: Medical Expense Receipts and Invoices
MedicalExpenseReceipts.description: Receipts, invoices, and payment confirmations for all medical, hospital, and rehabilitation services.

DoctorAssessment.title: Medical Doctor's Assessment and Certificate
DoctorAssessment.description: A physician's certificate detailing the nature, extent, and duration of the injury, and prognosis for recovery or permanent disability.

LostEarningProof.title: Proof of Lost Earnings (Salary Slips/Tax Docs)
LostEarningProof.description: Documents showing previous income and the period during which the claimant was unable to work due to the injury.

FinalAdminDecision.title: Final Administrative Decision (የመጨረሻ የአስተዳደር ውሳኔ)
FinalAdminDecision.description: The written, final decision issued by the administrative agency, signed by the competent official. This decision must be exhausted before court appeal (Art. 48(1)).

DecisionNotificationProof.title: Proof of Decision Notification Date (ውሳኔው የደረሰበት ማስረጃ)
DecisionNotificationProof.description: Evidence (e.g., date stamp, certified mail receipt) showing the exact date the petitioner was notified of the final administrative decision. Crucial for the 30-day appeal limit (Art. 51(1)).

InternalRemedyExhaustion.title: Proof of Exhaustion of Internal Remedies (የውስጥ ቅሬታ መሟጠጥ ማስረጃ)
InternalRemedyExhaustion.description: Documentation showing the petitioner first raised the complaint to the agency's internal complaint body and received a final decision (Art. 48(2)).

AgencyDirectiveCopy.title: Copy of the Challenged Directive (የሚጠየቀው መመሪያ ቅጂ)
AgencyDirectiveCopy.description: A copy of the specific Directive issued by the Agency that is being challenged for judicial review (Art. 48(1)).

ShareholdersResolution.title: Shareholders' / Partners' Resolution (የአክሲዮን ባለቤቶች/አጋሮች ውሳኔ)
ShareholdersResolution.description: Certified minutes from a General Meeting or Board meeting authorizing the legal action or confirming the internal decision (e.g., dissolution, capital increase).

MemorandumAndArticles.title: Memorandum & Articles of Association (የማኅበር መመስረቻና መተዳደሪያ ደንብ)
MemorandumAndArticles.description: The registered founding documents (Memorandum/Articles) of the business organization, showing capital structure, purpose, and management rules.

NotarizedCheque.title: Notarized Cheque or Promissory Note (በኖታሪ የተረጋገጠ ቼክ ወይም የብድር ቃል ኪዳን)
NotarizedCheque.description: The original negotiable instrument (cheque, bill of exchange, or promissory note) legally validated for recourse or payment claim.

ProtestCertificate.title: Certificate of Protest / Non-Payment (የክፍያ እምቢታ ማረጋገጫ)
ProtestCertificate.description: Official document from a notary or court certifying that the instrument was duly presented for payment and payment was refused (required for recourse).

BalanceSheetAndAudit.title: Recent Audited Financial Statements (የቅርብ ጊዜ ኦዲት የተደረገ የሒሳብ መግለጫ)
BalanceSheetAndAudit.description: The last three years of audited balance sheets and income statements, crucial for insolvency or business valuation proceedings.

ListofCreditors.title: Comprehensive List of Creditors (የአበዳሪዎች ዝርዝር)
ListofCreditors.description: A detailed, certified list of all creditors, their claims, and security status (required for restructuring or bankruptcy applications).

MedicalCertificateMentalState.title: Medical Certificate of Mental State (የአእምሮ ሁኔታ የህክምና ማስረጃ)
MedicalCertificateMentalState.description: A certified psychiatric or psychological evaluation confirming a severe mental disease or deficiency at the time of the alleged offense.

ProofOfImminentDanger.title: Proof of Imminent Danger (የቅርብ አደጋ ማስረጃ)
ProofOfImminentDanger.description: Witness statements, scene photos, or police reports demonstrating an immediate and unavoidable threat to life or property.

OfficialOrderDocument.title: Official Order or Warrant (ኦፊሴላዊ ትዕዛዝ ወይም ማዘዣ)
OfficialOrderDocument.description: Written documentation proving the alleged criminal act was carried out under the legal order or command of a superior public authority.

VictimConsentForm.title: Victim's Written Consent (ተጎጂው የሰጠው የጽሑፍ ፈቃድ)
VictimConsentForm.description: A signed document showing the victim consented to the act, applicable only where consent is legally valid (e.g., minor bodily harm, property damage).

WitnessStatementsIntoxication.title: Witness Statements on Intoxication (ስለ ስካር ሁኔታ የምስክርነት ቃል)
WitnessStatementsIntoxication.description: Statements confirming the defendant's involuntary or non-culpable state of intoxication at the time of the alleged offense.

OriginalPleadingCopy.title: Copy of Original Pleading (የመጀመሪያ ክስ ወይም መቃወሚያ ቅጂ)
OriginalPleadingCopy.description: A certified copy of the original statement of claim or statement of defence that is subject to the proposed amendment.

DraftAmendment.title: Draft of the Proposed Amendment (የታቀደው ማሻሻያ ረቂቅ)
DraftAmendment.description: The full, written text of the changes, additions, or deletions sought to be included in the original pleading.

IntervenerStatement.title: Intervener's Statement of Claim/Defence (ጣልቃ ገቢው ክስ/መቃወሚያ)
IntervenerStatement.description: A full statement outlining the intervener's legal interest in the subject matter of the existing suit and their claims or defenses.

ThirdPartyNotice.title: Draft Third-Party Notice (ለሶስተኛ ወገን የጥሪ ማስታወቂያ ረቂቅ)
ThirdPartyNotice.description: The specific notice or claim that the Defendant intends to serve on the third party, detailing the basis for indemnity or contribution.

ObjectionGroundsMemo.title: Memorandum of Objection Grounds (የተቃውሞ ምክንያቶች ማስታወሻ)
ObjectionGroundsMemo.description: A detailed legal memorandum specifying the factual or legal errors upon which the judgment objection is based (e.g., lack of service, fraud).

ReviewApplicationMemo.title: Review Application Memorandum (የፍርድ ዳግም የማየት ማስታወሻ)
ReviewApplicationMemo.description: A memorandum specifying the new, crucial evidence discovered or the error on the face of the record required for a review of judgment.

ip_trademark_infringement.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Trademark Infringement and Damages (የንግድ ምልክት ጥሰት እና የካሳ ክስ)

facets.legalText: The Plaintiff is the registered owner of Trademark No. [Number] for goods/services in Class [Class]. (ከሳሽ በክፍል [Class] ውስጥ ለሚገኙ ዕቃዎች/አገልግሎቶች የንግድ ምልክት ቁጥር [Number] የተመዘገበ ባለቤት ነው።)
The Defendant is using an identical or confusingly similar mark in the course of trade. (ተከሳሹ በንግድ ሂደት ውስጥ ተመሳሳይ ወይም አሳሳች ምልክት እየተጠቀመ ነው።)
The Defendant's use is likely to cause confusion among the relevant consumers. (የተከሳሹ አጠቃቀም በሚመለከታቸው ሸማቾች መካከል ግራ መጋባት ሊፈጥር ይችላል።)

reliefs.text: Judgment granting a permanent injunction restraining the Defendant from further use of the infringing mark. (ተከሳሹ የጣሰውን ምልክት እንዳይጠቀም የሚከለክል ቋሚ እገዳ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order payment of damages suffered by the Plaintiff due to the infringement. (በጥሰቱ ምክንያት በከሳሽ የደረሰውን ጉዳት ካሳ እንዲከፍል ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order the destruction of all infringing materials and goods. (ሁሉም የጣሱ ቁሳቁሶች እና ዕቃዎች እንዲወድሙ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

ip_patent_infringement.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Patent Infringement and Compensation (የፓተንት ጥሰት እና የካሳ ክስ)

facets.legalText: The Plaintiff holds Patent No. [Number], which is valid and in force. (ከሳሽ የፓተንት ቁጥር [Number] ያለው ሲሆን ይህም ሕጋዊ እና በሥራ ላይ ነው።)
The Defendant is manufacturing/selling a product that falls within the scope of the patent claims. (ተከሳሹ በፓተንት ጥያቄዎች ወሰን ውስጥ የሚወድቅ ምርት በማምረት/በመሸጥ ላይ ነው።)
The infringement has resulted in direct commercial loss of [Amount] due to lost sales. (ጥሰቱ በሽያጭ በመጥፋቱ ምክንያት የ [Amount] ቀጥተኛ የንግድ ኪሳራ አስከትሏል።)

reliefs.text: Judgment ordering the Defendant to cease all acts of manufacturing and selling the infringing product. (ተከሳሹ የጣሰውን ምርት ማምረት እና መሸጥ እንዲያቆም የሚገልጽ ፍርድ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order payment of compensation calculated based on a reasonable royalty fee. (በተመጣጣኝ የሮያሊቲ ክፍያ ላይ ተመስርቶ የካሳ ክፍያ እንዲፈጽም ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order the seizure and disposal of the machinery primarily used to produce the infringing articles. (የጣሱትን ዕቃዎች ለማምረት በዋናነት ያገለገሉ ማሽነሪዎች እንዲወረሱ እና እንዲወገዱ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

ip_copyright_infringement.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Copyright Violation and Statutory Damages (የቅጂ መብት ጥሰት እና የሕግ ካሳ ክስ)
ip_copyright_infringement.jurisdictionText: Art. 38 of Copyright and Neighboring Rights Proclamation No. 410/2004.

facets.legalText: The Plaintiff is the author of the original work [Title] published/fixed on [Date]. (ከሳሽ በ [Date] የታተመ/የተቀረጸው የ [Title] የመጀመሪያ ሥራ ደራሲ ነው።)
The Defendant has reproduced, distributed, or publicly performed the work without authorization. (ተከሳሹ ሥራውን ያለፈቃድ አባዝቷል፣ አሰራጭቷል ወይም በይፋ አቅርቧል።)
The infringement was committed on a commercial scale. (ጥሰቱ የተፈጸመው በንግድ ደረጃ ነው።)

reliefs.text: Order payment of statutory damages as provided by law, or actual damages suffered. (በሕግ የተደነገገውን የሕግ ካሳ ወይም የደረሰውን ትክክለኛ ጉዳት እንዲከፍል ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order a final injunction prohibiting further unauthorized use. (ተጨማሪ ያልተፈቀደ አጠቃቀምን የሚከለክል የመጨረሻ እገዳ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order the impoundment of all copies of the infringing work. (ሁሉም የጣሱ ሥራ ቅጂዎች እንዲወረሱ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

app_ip_interlocutory_injunction.documentTitle: Application for Interlocutory Injunction to Restrain Infringement (የጥሰት እገዳ እንዲጣልበት ጊዜያዊ ትዕዛዝ ማመልከቻ)
app_ip_interlocutory_injunction.jurisdictionText: Art. 154 of the Civil Procedure Code (General Injunction) and specific IP enabling clauses.

facets.legalText: The Applicant has established a strong prima facie case of infringement. (አመልካቹ ጠንካራ የቅድመ-ገጽታ የጥሰት ጉዳይ አቋቁሟል።)
The continued infringement will cause irreparable harm to the Applicant's market share and reputation. (የቀጠለው ጥሰት በአመልካቹ የገበያ ድርሻ እና ስም ላይ ሊጠገን የማይችል ጉዳት ያስከትላል።)
The balance of convenience favors granting the injunction (i.e., less harm to stop than to continue). (የምቾት ሚዛን እገዳውን ለመስጠት ይደግፋል (ማለትም ከማቆም ይልቅ ለማቆም አነስተኛ ጉዳት)።)

reliefs.text: Order the Respondent to temporarily cease all manufacture, sale, or distribution of the infringing goods pending final judgment. (የመጨረሻ ፍርድ እስከሚሰጥ ድረስ ተጠሪው የጣሱትን ዕቃዎች ማምረት፣ መሸጥ ወይም ማሰራጨት ለጊዜው እንዲያቆም ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

app_ip_anton_piller.documentTitle: Application for Preservation and Seizure of Evidence (የማስረጃ ጥበቃ እና መያዣ ማመልከቻ)
app_ip_anton_piller.jurisdictionText: Art. 154 of the Civil Procedure Code (Inherent Power) & Art. 10 of Proclamation 410/2004.

facets.legalText: There is a serious risk that the Defendant will destroy or conceal crucial evidence of infringement (e.g., molds, accounts). (ተከሳሹ ወሳኝ የጥሰት ማስረጃዎችን (ለምሳሌ ሻጋታዎችን፣ ሂሳቦችን) ያጠፋል ወይም ይደብቃል የሚል ከባድ ስጋት አለ።)
The Applicant has specific knowledge of the location and nature of the evidence. (አመልካቹ ስለ ማስረጃው ቦታ እና ተፈጥሮ የተወሰነ እውቀት አለው።)

reliefs.text: Order a court officer to enter the Respondent's premises to seize and preserve evidence relating to the infringement. (የፍርድ ቤት ባለሥልጣን ከጥሰቱ ጋር የተያያዙ ማስረጃዎችን ለመያዝ እና ለመጠበቅ ወደ ተጠሪው ግቢ እንዲገባ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

property_petitory_vindication.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Vindication of Property (Petitory Action) (የይዞታ ጥያቄ ክስ)

facets.legalText: The Plaintiff is the legal owner/holder of the immovable property situated at [Location]. (ከሳሽ በ [አካባቢ] የሚገኘው የማይንቀሳቀስ ንብረት ሕጋዊ ባለቤት/ባለይዞታ ነው።)
The Plaintiff acquired the property through [Sale/Succession/Grant] on [Date]. (ከሳሽ ንብረቱን በ [ሽያጭ/ውርስ/ስጦታ] በ [ቀን] አግኝቷል።)
The Defendant is currently in possession of the property without any legal title or right. (ተከሳሹ በአሁኑ ጊዜ ያለ ምንም ሕጋዊ መብት ወይም ሰነድ በንብረቱ ላይ ይዞታ አለው።)
Despite demands, the Defendant refuses to vacate the property. (ተከሳሹ በተደጋጋሚ ቢጠየቅም ንብረቱን ለቆ ለመውጣት ፈቃደኛ አልሆነም።)

reliefs.text: Judgment declaring the Plaintiff as the sole legal owner/holder of the property. (ከሳሽ የንብረቱ ብቸኛ ሕጋዊ ባለቤት/ባለይዞታ መሆኑን የሚገልጽ ፍርድ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order the Defendant to vacate the property and hand it over to the Plaintiff. (ተከሳሹ ንብረቱን ለቆ ለከሳሽ እንዲያስረክብ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order the Defendant to pay compensation (fruits/rent) for the period of unlawful occupation. (ተከሳሹ በሕገ-ወጥ ይዞታ ለቆየበት ጊዜ ካሳ (ፍራፍሬ/ኪራይ) እንዲከፍል ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

property_possessory_restoration.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Restoration of Possession (የተነጠቀ ይዞታን ለማስመለስ የሚቀርብ ክስ)

facets.legalText: The Plaintiff was in peaceful and continuous possession of the property. (ከሳሽ በንብረቱ ላይ ሰላማዊ እና ያልተቋረጠ ይዞታ ነበረው።)
The Defendant took possession by force/fraud on [Date]. (ተከሳሹ በ [ቀን] በኃይል/በማጭበርበር ይዞታውን ወስዷል።)
This claim is filed within two years of the usurpation. (ይህ ክስ ይዞታው ከተነጠቀበት ጊዜ ጀምሮ በሁለት ዓመት ውስጥ የቀረበ ነው።)

reliefs.text: Order the immediate restoration of possession to the Plaintiff (without prejudice to questions of title). (የባለቤትነት ጥያቄ እንደተጠበቀ ሆኖ ይዞታው ወዲያውኑ ለከሳሽ እንዲመለስ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

property_boundary_encroachment.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Removal of Boundary Encroachment (የድንበር መጣስ እንዲወገድ የሚቀርብ ክስ)

facets.legalText: The legal boundary between the Plaintiff's and Defendant's plots is defined by the official Site Plan. (በከሳሽ እና በተከሳሽ ይዞታዎች መካከል ያለው ሕጋዊ ድንበር በይፋዊ የሳይት ፕላን የተገለጸ ነው።)
The Defendant has constructed a wall/structure that crosses the boundary line by [Meters]. (ተከሳሹ የድንበር መስመሩን በ [ሜትር] የሚያልፍ ግድግዳ/አጥር ገንብቷል።)

reliefs.text: Order the Defendant to demolish the encroaching structure. (ተከሳሹ የጣሰውን ግንባታ እንዲያፈርስ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order the restoration of the boundary markers to their original position. (የድንበር ምልክቶቹ ወደ ቀድሞ ቦታቸው እንዲመለሱ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

app_stay_construction.documentTitle: Application for Urgent Order to Suspend Construction (ግንባታን ለማገድ አስቸኳይ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ የሚቀርብ ማመልከቻ)
app_stay_construction.jurisdictionText: Art. 154 of the Civil Procedure Code.

facets.legalText: The Respondent is currently engaged in active construction on the disputed land. (ተጠሪው በአሁኑ ጊዜ በተከራካሪው መሬት ላይ ንቁ ግንባታ በማከናወን ላይ ነው።)
If the construction is completed, demolition will be difficult and the Applicant's rights will be permanently prejudiced. (ግንባታው ከተጠናቀቀ ማፍረስ አስቸጋሪ ስለሚሆን የአመልካቹ መብቶች በዘላቂነት ይጎዳሉ።)
The Applicant has demonstrated a strong prima facie case of ownership. (አመልካቹ ጠንካራ የቅድመ-ገጽታ የባለቤትነት መብት አሳይቷል።)

reliefs.text: Order the immediate suspension of all construction activities on the disputed plot pending final judgment. (በተከራካሪው ይዞታ ላይ ያሉ ሁሉም የግንባታ ሥራዎች የመጨረሻ ፍርድ እስከሚሰጥ ድረስ ወዲያውኑ እንዲታገዱ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

app_local_inspection.documentTitle: Application for Order of Local Inspection (የአካባቢ ምርመራ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ የሚቀርብ ማመልከቻ)
app_local_inspection.jurisdictionText: Art. 136 of the Civil Procedure Code.

facets.legalText: The oral testimonies and documents regarding the physical features/boundaries of the land are contradictory. (የመሬቱን አካላዊ ገጽታዎች/ወሰኖች በተመለከተ የቃል ምስክርነቶች እና ሰነዶች እርስ በርሳቸው የሚጋጩ ናቸው።)
A just decision cannot be rendered without the Court (or its registrar) physically viewing the site. (ፍርድ ቤቱ (ወይም ሬጅስትራሩ) ቦታውን በአካል ሳይመለከት ፍትሐዊ ውሳኔ መስጠት አይቻልም።)

reliefs.text: Order a local inspection of the property to verify boundaries/possession. (የወሰን/ይዞታን ለማረጋገጥ የንብረቱ አካባቢያዊ ምርመራ እንዲደረግ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

property_nuisance_cessation.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Cessation of Abnormal Inconvenience (Nuisance) (ያልተለመደ ችግር (አደጋ) እንዲቆም የሚቀርብ ክስ)

facets.legalText: The Defendant's actions involve [Noise/Smell/Vibration] originating from [Source]. (የተከሳሹ ድርጊቶች ከ [ምንጭ] የሚመነጩትን [ጫጫታ/ሽታ/ንዝረት] ያካትታሉ።)
The inconvenience caused by the Defendant is abnormal and exceeds the level normally expected of the neighborhood. (በተከሳሹ የደረሰው ችግር ያልተለመደ እና ከአካባቢው ከሚጠበቀው ደረጃ የላቀ ነው።)
The Defendant was formally notified of the inconvenience but failed to take corrective measures. (ተከሳሹ ስለ ችግሩ በይፋ ቢነገረውም የማስተካከያ እርምጃዎችን አልወሰደም።)

reliefs.text: Judgment ordering the Defendant to immediately cease the source of the abnormal inconvenience. (ተከሳሹ ያልተለመደውን የችግር ምንጭ ወዲያውኑ እንዲያቆም የሚገልጽ ፍርድ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order payment of damages suffered by the Plaintiff prior to the cessation. (ከማቆሙ በፊት በከሳሽ የደረሰውን ጉዳት ካሳ እንዲከፍል ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

property_servitude_right_of_way.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Establishment of Servitude (Right of Way) (የመንገድ መብት አገልግሎት እንዲቋቋም የሚቀርብ ክስ)

facets.legalText: The Applicant's property has no adequate access to a public road. (የአመልካቹ ንብረት ወደ ህዝብ መንገድ በቂ መዳረሻ የለውም።)
There are no other practical or less onerous routes available for access. (ለመዳረሻ ሌላ ተግባራዊ ወይም አነስተኛ ሸክም ያለባቸው መንገዶች የሉም።)
The requested right of way across the Respondent's land is the route least detrimental to the Servient Tenement (Respondent). (በተጠሪው መሬት ላይ የተጠየቀው የመንገድ መብት ለተጠሪው አነስተኛ ጉዳት የሚያደርስ መንገድ ነው።)

reliefs.text: Judgment establishing a Servitude of Right of Way across the Respondent's property. (በተጠሪው ንብረት ላይ የመንገድ መብት አገልግሎት እንዲቋቋም የሚገልጽ ፍርድ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order the Dominant Tenement to pay fair compensation to the Servient Tenement for the damage caused by the passage. (አመልካቹ በመተላለፊያው ምክንያት ለደረሰው ጉዳት ለተጠሪው ፍትሃዊ ካሳ እንዲከፍል ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

property_possessory_disturbance.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Cessation of Disturbance of Possession (የይዞታ መረበሽ እንዲቆም የሚቀርብ ክስ)

facets.legalText: The Plaintiff was in peaceful and continuous possession of the property/right. (ከሳሽ በንብረቱ/መብቱ ላይ ሰላማዊ እና ያልተቋረጠ ይዞታ ነበረው።)

The Defendant has performed specific actions that interfere with the Plaintiff's peaceful possession (e.g., removing fences, obstructing access). (ተከሳሹ የከሳሽን ሰላማዊ ይዞታ የሚያውኩ የተወሰኑ ድርጊቶችን ፈጽሟል (ለምሳሌ አጥርን ማስወገድ፣ መዳረሻን መከልከል)።)
This claim is filed within two years of the disturbance. (ይህ ክስ ረብሻው ከተፈጠረበት ጊዜ ጀምሮ በሁለት ዓመት ውስጥ የቀረበ ነው።)

reliefs.text: Order the Defendant to cease all acts of disturbance. (ተከሳሹ ሁሉንም የረብሻ ድርጊቶች እንዲያቆም ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order the restoration of the property to the state it was in before the disturbance. (ንብረቱ ረብሻው ከመከሰቱ በፊት ወደነበረበት ሁኔታ እንዲመለስ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

app_servitude_temporary_passage.documentTitle: Application for Temporary Mandatory Order to Grant Passage (ጊዜያዊ የግዴታ የመተላለፊያ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ ማመልከቻ)
app_servitude_temporary_passage.jurisdictionText: Art. 154 of the Civil Procedure Code (Injunction) & Art. 1332 Civil Code (Necessity).

group_1.title: Urgency & Extreme Need (አስቸኳይነት እና ከፍተኛ ፍላጎት)

facets.legalText: The Respondent has completely blocked the Applicant's only access to the public road. (ተጠሪው የአመልካቹን ብቸኛ መውጫ ወደ ህዝብ መንገድ ሙሉ በሙሉ ዘግቷል።)

The blockade threatens the Applicant's ability to live/operate their business, causing imminent and irreparable financial damage. (እገዳው የአመልካቹን የመኖር/የንግድ ሥራ የመሥራት ችሎታን አደጋ ላይ ይጥላል፣ ይህም አስቸኳይ እና ሊጠገን የማይችል የገንዘብ ጉዳት ያስከትላል።)

reliefs.text: Order the Respondent to grant temporary passage to the Applicant pending the final decision on the main servitude claim. (በዋናው የአገልግሎት ጥያቄ ላይ የመጨረሻ ውሳኔ እስከሚሰጥ ድረስ ተጠሪው ለአመልካች ጊዜያዊ መተላለፊያ እንዲሰጥ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

contract_debt_recovery.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Recovery of Loan/Debt (የብድር/ዕዳ ማስመለሻ ክስ)
contract_debt_recovery.jurisdictionText: Art. 216 et seq. of the Civil Procedure Code & Civil Code Art. 2471.

facets.legalText: On [Date], the Plaintiff and Defendant entered into a written loan agreement. (በ [ቀን] ከሳሽ እና ተከሳሽ የጽሑፍ የብድር ስምምነት አድርገዋል።)
The Plaintiff disbursed the sum of [Amount] ETB to the Defendant. (ከሳሽ [መጠን] ብር ለተከሳሽ ሰጥቷል።)
The repayment period agreed upon expired on [Date]. (የተስማሙበት የመክፈያ ጊዜ በ [ቀን] አብቅቷል።)
Despite the maturity of the debt, the Defendant failed to effect payment. (ዕዳው ቢደርስም ተከሳሹ ክፍያ አልፈጸመም።)
The Plaintiff served a formal notice of default on [Date]. (ከሳሽ በ [ቀን] መደበኛ የውል ማፍረሻ ማስታወቂያ ሰጥቷል።)

reliefs.text: Judgment ordering the Defendant to pay the principal sum of [Amount] ETB. (ተከሳሹ ዋናውን ገንዘብ [መጠን] ብር እንዲከፍል የሚወስን ፍርድ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order payment of legal interest (9%) calculated from the date of default. (ከውል ማፍረሻ ቀን ጀምሮ የተሰላውን የሕግ ወለድ (9%) ክፍያ እንዲፈጽም ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order payment of contractual interest agreed at [Percentage] (max 12%). (በ [ፐርሰንት] የተስማማውን የውል ወለድ (ቢበዛ 12%) ክፍያ እንዲፈጽም ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

contract_specific_performance.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Specific Performance of Contract (ውልን ያለመፈጸም ክስ)
contract_specific_performance.jurisdictionText: Art. 1776 of the Civil Code & Civil Procedure Code.

facets.legalText: A valid contract exists between the parties regarding [Subject Matter]. (በ [ጉዳይ] ላይ በተዋዋይ ወገኖች መካከል ሕጋዊ ውል አለ።)
The Plaintiff has fully performed their obligations under the contract. (ከሳሽ በውሉ መሠረት ግዴታዎቹን ሙሉ በሙሉ ፈጽሟል።)
The Defendant has failed to perform [Specific Obligation] without lawful cause. (ተከሳሹ ያለ ሕጋዊ ምክንያት [የተወሰነ ግዴታ] አልፈጸመም።)
Specific performance is of special interest to the Plaintiff and does not affect the personal liberty of the Defendant. (የተወሰነ አፈጻጸም ለከሳሽ ልዩ ፍላጎት ያለው ሲሆን የተከሳሽን የግል ነፃነት አይጎዳውም።)

reliefs.text: Order the Defendant to specifically perform the contract by [Action, e.g., transferring title]. (ተከሳሹ [ድርጊት፣ ለምሳሌ የባለቤትነት ማስተላለፍ] በማድረግ ውሉን በተለይ እንዲፈጽም ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Alternatively, if performance is impossible, order payment of damages. (በአማራጭ፣ አፈጻጸም የማይቻል ከሆነ የካሳ ክፍያ እንዲፈጸም ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

contract_termination_claim.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Judicial Cancellation of Contract (የውል ስረዛ ክስ)

facets.legalText: The Defendant's non-performance constitutes a fundamental breach affecting the essence of the contract. (የተከሳሹ አለመፈጸም የውሉን ዋና ይዘት የሚነካ መሠረታዊ ጥሰት ነው።)
The Plaintiff has already paid [Amount] to the Defendant. (ከሳሽ ለተከሳሽ [መጠን] ከፍሏል።)

reliefs.text: Judgment declaring the contract cancelled/terminated. (ውሉ መሰረዙን/መቋረጡን የሚገልጽ ፍርድ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order the parties to be reinstated to their former position (Restitution). (ተዋዋይ ወገኖች ወደ ቀድሞ ሁኔታቸው እንዲመለሱ (ካሳ) ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

app_attachment_before_judgment.documentTitle: Application for Attachment of Property Before Judgment (ከፍርድ በፊት የንብረት እግድ ማመልከቻ)
app_attachment_before_judgment.jurisdictionText: Art. 151 & 152 of the Civil Procedure Code.

facets.legalText: The Defendant is about to dispose of their property or remove it from the court's jurisdiction with intent to obstruct the execution of the decree. (ተከሳሹ የፍርዱን አፈጻጸም ለማደናቀፍ በማሰብ ንብረቱን ሊያስወግድ ወይም ከፍርድ ቤቱ ሥልጣን ሊያርቅ ነው።)
The Applicant has a strong prima facie case and is likely to succeed in the main suit. (አመልካቹ ጠንካራ የቅድመ-ገጽታ ክስ ያለው ሲሆን በዋናው ክስ ላይ ሊሳካለት ይችላል።)

reliefs.text: Order the attachment of the Defendant's property [Specify Property] pending final judgment. (የመጨረሻ ፍርድ እስከሚሰጥ ድረስ የተከሳሽን ንብረት [ንብረቱን ይግለጹ] እንዲታገድ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Alternatively, order the Defendant to furnish security for the amount claimed. (በአማራጭ፣ ተከሳሹ ለተጠየቀው ገንዘብ ዋስትና እንዲያቀርብ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

app_judgment_on_admission.documentTitle: Application for Judgment on Admissions (በእምነት ላይ ለሚሰጥ ፍርድ ማመልከቻ)
app_judgment_on_admission.jurisdictionText: Art. 242 of the Civil Procedure Code.

facets.legalText: In their Statement of Defense, the Respondent has clearly admitted the existence of the contract and the debt. (በመከላከያ መግለጫቸው፣ ተጠሪው የውሉን እና የእዳውን መኖር በግልጽ አምኗል።)

reliefs.text: Enter immediate judgment for the Plaintiff on the admitted portion of the claim. (በተጠየቀው የይገባኛል ጥያቄ ክፍል ላይ ለከሳሽ ወዲያውኑ ፍርድ እንዲሰጥ።)

labour_unlawful_termination.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Unlawful Termination (ሕገ-ወጥ የስራ ስንብት ክስ)

facets.legalText: Existence of an indefinite period employment contract. (ላልተወሰነ ጊዜ የቅጥር ውል መኖር።)

A definite period or probationary contract existed, and the period has concluded, implying conversion to an indefinite contract. (የተወሰነ ጊዜ ወይም የሙከራ ውል ነበረ፣ እና ጊዜው አልቋል፣ ይህም ወደ ላልተወሰነ ጊዜ ውል መቀየሩን ያመለክታል።)

group_2.title: The Act of Termination: Procedural Violations (የስንብት ድርጊት፡ የሥነ-ሥርዓት ጥሰቶች)

facets.legalText: Termination was effected without any prior written notice specifying the reasons and date of termination. (ስንብቱ የተፈጸመው ምክንያቱን እና የስንብት ቀንን የሚገልጽ የጽሑፍ ማስታወቂያ ሳይሰጥ ነው።)
The notice period provided was insufficient and less than the legal minimum based on years of service. (የተሰጠው የማስታወቂያ ጊዜ በቂ ያልሆነ እና በአገልግሎት ዓመታት ላይ ከተመሠረተው ሕጋዊ ዝቅተኛው ያነሰ ነበር።)

group_3.title: The Act of Termination: Substantive Violations (Unlawful Grounds) (የስንብት ድርጊት፡ ዋና ጥሰቶች (ሕገ-ወጥ ምክንያቶች))

facets.legalText: Termination was due to the employee's membership in a trade union or participation in union activities. (ስንብቱ የተከሰተው በሠራተኛው የሠራተኛ ማኅበር አባልነት ወይም በማኅበር እንቅስቃሴዎች በመሳተፉ ምክንያት ነው።)
Termination was due to the employee's pregnancy or maternity leave status. (ስንብቱ የተከሰተው በሠራተኛው የእርግዝና ወይም የወሊድ ፈቃድ ሁኔታ ምክንያት ነው።)
Termination was due to the employee giving information or filing a complaint against the employer regarding a breach of law. (ስንብቱ የተከሰተው ሠራተኛው ስለ ሕግ ጥሰት መረጃ በመስጠቱ ወይም በአሠሪው ላይ ቅሬታ በማቅረቡ ምክንያት ነው።)

Termination was based on discriminatory grounds such as race, color, sex, religion, political opinion, national extraction, or social origin. (ስንብቱ የተመሠረተው በዘር፣ በቀለም፣ በጾታ፣ በሃይማኖት፣ በፖለቲካ አስተያየት፣ በብሔራዊ አመጣጥ ወይም በማኅበራዊ አመጣጥ ላይ ባሉ አድሎአዊ ምክንያቶች ላይ ነው።)

group_4.title: The Act of Termination: The "No Reason" Defense (የስንብት ድርጊት፡ "ምክንያት የለም" መከላከያ)

facets.legalText: The employer failed to provide a valid reason for termination related to the worker's capacity or conduct, or the organizational needs of the undertaking. (አሠሪው ከሠራተኛው ችሎታ ወይም ምግባር ወይም ከድርጅቱ ድርጅታዊ ፍላጎቶች ጋር የተያያዘ ትክክለኛ የስንብት ምክንያት አልሰጠም።)

group_5.title: The Act of Termination: Constructive Dismissal (የስንብት ድርጊት፡ ገንቢ ስንብት)

facets.legalText: Employee was forced to resign due to the employer's unlawful or abusive actions (e.g., sexual harassment, assault, danger to safety), which constitutes termination by the employer. (ሠራተኛው በአሠሪው ሕገ-ወጥ ወይም አስነዋሪ ድርጊቶች (ለምሳሌ ወሲባዊ ትንኮሳ፣ ጥቃት፣ ለደህንነት አስጊ) ምክንያት ሥራውን ለመልቀቅ ተገድዷል፣ ይህም በአሠሪው እንደ ስንብት ይቆጠራል።)

reliefs.text: Judgment declaring the termination unlawful pursuant to Art. 43. (በአንቀጽ 43 መሠረት ስንብቱ ሕገ-ወጥ መሆኑን የሚገልጽ ፍርድ እንዲሰጥ።)

Order for reinstatement to previous position with full back pay from the date of termination until reinstatement (Art. 43(1)). (ከስንብት ቀን ጀምሮ እስከ መመለሻ ድረስ ሙሉ የኋላ ክፍያ በመክፈል ወደ ቀድሞ ቦታው እንዲመለስ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ (አንቀጽ 43(1))።)

Payment of compensation in lieu of reinstatement, equivalent to 180 times the average daily wage, and an additional 30 days for each year of service (not to exceed 12 months total) (Art. 43(2,3)). (ከመመለስ ይልቅ የካሳ ክፍያ၊ ከአማካይ የቀን ደመወዝ 180 እጥፍ ጋር የሚመጣጠን፣ እና ለእያንዳንዱ የአገልግሎት ዓመት ተጨማሪ 30 ቀናት (በአጠቃላይ ከ12 ወራት የማይበልጥ) (አንቀጽ 43(2,3))።)
Payment of Severance Pay as per the calculation in Art. 39 & 40 (Only if not reinstated). (በአንቀጽ 39 እና 40 ስሌት መሠረት የስንብት ክፍያ (ካልተመለሰ ብቻ)።)
Payment of Compensation for lack of proper notice, equivalent to salary for the notice period (Art. 44). (ትክክለኛ ማስታወቂያ ባለመስጠቱ ምክንያት ካሳ ክፍያ፣ ከማስታወቂያው ጊዜ ደመወዝ ጋር የሚመጣጠን (አንቀጽ 44)።)
Costs and fees to be covered by the respondent. (ወጪዎች እና ክፍያዎች በተከሳሹ እንዲሸፈኑ።)

labour_unpaid_wages.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Outstanding Payments (ላልተከፈለ ክፍያ ክስ)

facets.legalText: Non-payment of regular monthly salary for the month(s) of [Specify Months]. (የ [ወራትን ይግለጹ] መደበኛ ወርሃዊ ደመወዝ አለመክፈል።)
An unlawful deduction was made from the salary without employee consent or a valid court order. (ያለ ሠራተኛ ፈቃድ ወይም ሕጋዊ የፍርድ ቤት ትዕዛዝ ከደመወዝ ሕገ-ወጥ ቅናሽ ተደርጓል።)

Employee worked beyond the standard 8 hours/day or 48 hours/week without receiving overtime compensation at the legally mandated rates. (ሠራተኛው ከመደበኛ 8 ሰዓት/በቀን ወይም 48 ሰዓት/በሳምንት በላይ ሠርቷል ነገር ግን በሕግ በተደነገገው መሠረት የትርፍ ሰዓት ካሳ አላገኘም።)

Employee was not permitted to take annual leave and was not compensated for the accrued, unused leave upon termination of employment. (ሠራተኛው ዓመታዊ ፈቃድ እንዲወስድ አልተፈቀደለትም እና ሥራው ሲቋረጥ ላላገለገለበት ፈቃድ ካሳ አልተከፈለውም።)
facets.citation: Art. 77 & 79 (Conversion to cash only upon termination)

facets.legalText: Employee worked on public holidays but was not compensated at a rate of two times their ordinary hourly rate. (ሠራተኛው በሕዝባዊ በዓላት ላይ ሠርቷል ነገር ግን ከመደበኛ የሰዓት ደመወዙ በሁለት እጥፍ ካሳ አልተከፈለውም።)

reliefs.text: An order for the Respondent to pay the total principal amount of all outstanding wages and benefits. (ተጠሪው ሁሉንም ያልተከፈሉ ደመወዞች እና ጥቅማጥቅሞች አጠቃላይ ዋና መጠን እንዲከፍል ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
An order for the payment of statutory interest on the delayed payments as per the relevant provisions of the Civil Code. (በሲቪል ሕጉ አግባብነት ባላቸው ድንጋጌዎች መሠረት በዘገዩ ክፍያዎች ላይ የሕግ ወለድ እንዲከፈል ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
A specific order for the payment of calculated overtime wages. (የተሰላ የትርፍ ሰዓት ደመወዝ እንዲከፈል የተወሰነ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Costs and fees to be covered by the respondent. (ወጪዎች እና ክፍያዎች በተከሳሹ እንዲሸፈኑ።)

labour_employment_injury.documentTitle: Claim for Employment Injury Compensation (የሥራ ጉዳት ካሳ ጥያቄ)

facets.legalText: The injury occurred during the performance of the employee's duties within the regular working hours and at the designated workplace. (ጉዳቱ የደረሰው ሠራተኛው በተለመደው የሥራ ሰዓት እና በተሰየመው የሥራ ቦታ ላይ ግዴታውን በሚወጣበት ጊዜ ነው።)

The injury occurred while the employee was commuting directly between their residence and the workplace, using transport provided by the employer. (ጉዳቱ የደረሰው ሠራተኛው በአሠሪው በተሰጠው መጓጓዣ በቀጥታ በመኖሪያ ቤቱ እና በሥራ ቦታው መካከል ሲጓዝ ነው።)
The injury occurred outside the regular workplace while the employee was carrying out a specific order given by the employer. (ጉዳቱ የደረሰው ሠራተኛው በአሠሪው የተሰጠውን የተወሰነ ትዕዛዝ ሲፈጽም ከመደበኛው የሥራ ቦታ ውጭ ነው።)
The employee has contracted an occupational disease as a direct result of exposure to hazards in the work environment. (ሠራተኛው በሥራ አካባቢ ውስጥ ላሉ አደጋዎች በመጋለጡ ምክንያት የሙያ በሽታ ተይዟል።)
A permanent partial disability has been sustained as a result of the injury, confirmed by a medical board certificate. (በጉዳቱ ምክንያት ቋሚ ከፊል የአካል ጉዳት ደርሷል፣ ይህም በሕክምና ቦርድ የምስክር ወረቀት የተረጋገጠ ነው።)
A temporary total disability was sustained, rendering the employee unable to work for a specific period. (ጊዜያዊ አጠቃላይ የአካል ጉዳት ደርሶበታል፣ ይህም ሠራተኛው ለተወሰነ ጊዜ መሥራት እንዳይችል አድርጎታል።)

reliefs.text: An order for the full payment of all medical, surgical, pharmaceutical, and hospital care expenses incurred due to the injury (Art. 105). (በጉዳቱ ምክንያት ለደረሱት ሁሉም የሕክምና፣ የቀዶ ጥገና፣ የመድኃኒት እና የሆስፒታል እንክብካቤ ወጪዎች ሙሉ ክፍያ እንዲፈጸም ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ (አንቀጽ 105)።)

Payment of disability compensation, calculated based on the employee's salary and the percentage of disability as determined by the medical board (Art. 109 & 110). (በሠራተኛው ደመወዝ እና በሕክምና ቦርዱ በተወሰነው የአካል ጉዳት መቶኛ ላይ በመመርኮዝ የተሰላ የአካል ጉዳት ካሳ ክፍያ (አንቀጽ 109 እና 110)።)

Payment for temporary disability, equivalent to 75% of the employee's daily wage, for the duration of the disability (Art. 106). (ለጊዜያዊ የአካል ጉዳት ክፍያ፣ ከሠራተኛው የቀን ደመወዝ 75% ጋር የሚመጣጠን፣ ለአካል ጉዳቱ ጊዜ (አንቀጽ 106)።)
Costs and fees to be covered by the respondent. (ወጪዎች እና ክፍያዎች በተከሳሹ እንዲሸፈኑ።)

civil_service_disciplinary_appeal.documentTitle: Memorandum of Appeal to the Administrative Tribunal (ለአስተዳደር ፍርድ ቤት ይግባኝ ማቅረቢያ)

facets.legalText: Dismissal from Service. (ከሥራ መባረር።)
Downgrading of job position/grade. (የሥራ መደብ/ደረጃ ዝቅ ማድረግ።)
Imposition of a fine exceeding one month's salary. (ከአንድ ወር ደመወዝ በላይ የሆነ ቅጣት መጣል።)
The Institution took the measure without giving the Appellant a chance to present a defense. (ተቋሙ ይግባኝ ባዩ መከላከያ እንዲያቀርብ እድል ሳይሰጥ እርምጃውን ወስዷል።)
The rigorous measure was taken more than 1 year after the offense was known, barring it by limitation. (ጥብቅ እርምጃው ጥፋቱ ከታወቀ ከ1 ዓመት በላይ ተወስዷል፣ ይህም በይርጋ እንዲታገድ ያደርገዋል።)
The simple measure was taken more than 6 months after the offense was known, barring it by limitation. (ቀላል እርምጃው ጥፋቱ ከታወቀ ከ6 ወራት በላይ ተወስዷል፣ ይህም በይርጋ እንዲታገድ ያደርገዋል።)
The Disciplinary Committee was not constituted according to Regulation 77/2002 (e.g., no staff representative). (የዲሲፕሊን ኮሚቴው በደንብ 77/2002 መሠረት አልተቋቋመም (ለምሳሌ የሠራተኛ ተወካይ የለም)።)
The alleged act does not constitute a disciplinary offense under the law. (የተጠረጠረው ድርጊት በሕጉ መሠረት የዲሲፕሊን ጥፋት አይደለም።)
The penalty is disproportionate to the offense committed. (ቅጣቱ ለተፈጸመው ጥፋት ተመጣጣኝ አይደለም።)
The appellant was already punished for the same alleged offense. (ይግባኝ ባዩ በተመሳሳይ በተጠረጠረ ጥፋት ቀደም ሲል ተቀጥቷል።)

reliefs.text: To quash/annul the administrative decision of the Respondent Institution. (የተጠሪ ተቋሙን አስተዳደራዊ ውሳኔ ለመሻር/ለማበላሸት።)

To order the reinstatement of the Appellant to their former position and payment of full salary for the period of suspension (Art. 81(3)). (ይግባኝ ባዩ ወደ ቀድሞ ቦታው እንዲመለስ እና ለእግድ ጊዜ ሙሉ ደመወዝ እንዲከፈለው ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ (አንቀጽ 81(3))።)
To order the expunging of the disciplinary measure from the Appellant's personal file. (የዲሲፕሊን እርምጃው ከይግባኝ ባዩ የግል ፋይል እንዲሰረዝ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

civil_service_termination_unlawful.documentTitle: Appeal Against Administrative Termination (በአስተዳደራዊ ስንብት ላይ ይግባኝ)

facets.legalText: Termination for performance was unlawful as the Appellant did not receive two consecutive "unsatisfactory" evaluations. (ለአፈጻጸም ስንብት ሕገ-ወጥ ነበር ምክንያቱም ይግባኝ ባዩ ሁለት ተከታታይ "የማያረካ" ግምገማዎችን አላገኘም።)
Termination for performance was unlawful as the Appellant was not provided with necessary training and support to improve. (ለአፈጻጸም ስንብት ሕገ-ወጥ ነበር ምክንያቱም ይግባኝ ባዩ ለማሻሻል አስፈላጊውን ሥልጠና እና ድጋፍ ስላልተሰጠው።)

Termination due to illness was unlawful as it occurred before the Appellant had exhausted all available sick leave (8 months on full pay, 4 months on half pay). (በሕመም ምክንያት ስንብት ሕገ-ወጥ ነበር ምክንያቱም ይግባኝ ባዩ ሁሉንም ያለውን የሕመም ፈቃድ (8 ወር ሙሉ ደመወዝ፣ 4 ወር ግማሽ ደመወዝ) ከማብቃቱ በፊት የተከሰተ በመሆኑ ነው።)
Termination due to illness was unlawful as no Medical Board certificate was produced to declare permanent disability. (በሕመም ምክንያት ስንብት ሕገ-ወጥ ነበር ምክንያቱም ቋሚ የአካል ጉዳትን ለማወጅ የሕክምና ቦርድ የምስክር ወረቀት ስላልቀረበ።)

group_3.title: Grounds: Force Majeure / Redundancy (ምክንያቶች፡ ከአቅም በላይ / ቅነሳ)

facets.legalText: Termination due to abolition of position (redundancy) was unlawful as the Appellant was not offered a similar vacant position before termination. (በሥራ መደብ መጥፋት (ቅነሳ) ምክንያት ስንብት ሕገ-ወጥ ነበር ምክንያቱም ይግባኝ ባዩ ከስንብት በፊት ተመሳሳይ ክፍት የሥራ ቦታ ስላልተሰጠው።)

reliefs.text: To quash/annul the administrative decision of termination. (የስንብት አስተዳደራዊ ውሳኔን ለመሻር/ለማበላሸት።)
To order the reinstatement of the Appellant to their former position with full back pay. (ይግባኝ ባዩ ወደ ቀድሞ ቦታው ሙሉ የኋላ ክፍያ እንዲመለስ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

civil_service_benefits_grievance.documentTitle: Appeal on Service Rights & Benefits (በአገልግሎት መብቶች እና ጥቅሞች ላይ ይግባኝ)

facets.legalText: A complaint was submitted to the institutional Grievance Handling Committee on [Date], but the decision was unsatisfactory or not rendered in time. (በ [ቀን] ለተቋሙ የቅሬታ አያያዝ ኮሚቴ ቅሬታ ቀርቧል፣ ነገር ግን ውሳኔው አጥጋቢ አልነበረም ወይም በጊዜ አልተሰጠም።)

The Appellant was unlawfully denied a promotion despite scoring higher points than the selected candidate, in violation of the merit principle. (ይግባኝ ባዩ ከተመረጠው እጩ ከፍ ያለ ነጥብ ቢያስመዘግብም፣ የብቃት መርህን በመጣስ በሕገ-ወጥ መንገድ ዕድገት ተከልክሏል።)
The Appellant was unlawfully denied a periodic salary increment despite meeting all performance requirements. (ይግባኝ ባዩ ሁሉንም የአፈጻጸም መስፈርቶች ቢያሟላም በሕገ-ወጥ መንገድ ወቅታዊ የደመወዝ ጭማሪ ተከልክሏል።)

The Appellant served in a higher position in an acting capacity but was unlawfully denied the acting allowance for that period. (ይግባኝ ባዩ በከፍተኛ የሥራ መደብ በተጠባባቂነት አገልግሏል ነገር ግን ለዚያ ጊዜ በሕገ-ወጥ መንገድ የተጠባባቂ አበል ተከልክሏል።)

reliefs.text: To order the Respondent Institution to grant the promotion due to the Appellant. (ተጠሪው ተቋም ለይግባኝ ባዩ የሚገባውን ዕድገት እንዲሰጥ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
To order the payment of the denied salary increment, with retroactive effect. (የተከለከለውን የደመወዝ ጭማሪ፣ ከኋላ ቀር ውጤት ጋር እንዲከፈል ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
To order the refund of any unlawfully deducted salary. (በሕገ-ወጥ መንገድ የተቀነሰ ማንኛውንም ደመወዝ እንዲመለስ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

family_divorce_dispute.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Dissolution of Marriage (የጋብቻ መፍረስ ክስ)
family_divorce_dispute.jurisdictionText: Art. 11(2) of Federal Courts Proc. 25/96 and Art. 76 of the Revised Family Code.

facets.legalText: The Plaintiff and Defendant were legally married on [Date]. (ከሳሽ እና ተከሳሽ በ [ቀን] በሕጋዊ መንገድ ተጋብተዋል።)
There are irreconcilable differences making the continuation of the marriage impossible. (የጋብቻውን መቀጠል የማይቻል የሚያደርጉ የማይታረቁ ልዩነቶች አሉ።)
The parties have lived separately for a period exceeding [Number] months. (ተዋዋይ ወገኖች ከ [ቁጥር] ወራት በላይ ለብቻቸው ኖረዋል።)
The marriage produced [Number] children. (ጋብቻው [ቁጥር] ልጆችን አፍርቷል።)

reliefs.text: Judgment dissolving the marriage between the Plaintiff and Defendant. (በከሳሽ እና በተከሳሽ መካከል ያለውን ጋብቻ የሚፈርስ ፍርድ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order granting sole/joint custody of the minor children to the Plaintiff. (የአካለ መጠን ያልደረሱ ልጆችን ብቸኛ/የጋራ የማሳደግ መብት ለከሳሽ እንዲሰጥ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order for the Defendant to pay monthly child maintenance. (ተከሳሹ ወርሃዊ የልጅ ማሳደጊያ እንዲከፍል ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order for the liquidation and partition of common marital property. (የጋራ የጋብቻ ንብረትን ለማፍሰስ እና ለመከፋፈል ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

family_divorce_agreement.documentTitle: Petition for Approval of Divorce by Mutual Consent (በጋራ ስምምነት የፍቺ ማመልከቻ)
family_divorce_agreement.jurisdictionText: Art. 77 of the Revised Family Code.

facets.legalText: Both parties have voluntarily agreed to dissolve their marriage. (ሁለቱም ወገኖች በፈቃደኝነት ጋብቻቸውን ለማፍረስ ተስማምተዋል።)
The parties have prepared a comprehensive agreement regarding the division of property and custody of children. (ተዋዋይ ወገኖች የንብረት ክፍፍልን እና የልጆችን የማሳደግ መብትን በተመለከተ አጠቃላይ ስምምነት አዘጋጅተዋል።)

reliefs.text: Order approving the divorce agreement and dissolving the marriage. (የፍቺውን ስምምነት በማጽደቅ ጋብቻውን የሚፈርስ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

family_paternity_claim.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Judicial Declaration of Paternity (የአባትነት ማረጋገጫ ክስ)
family_paternity_claim.jurisdictionText: Art. 143 of the Revised Family Code.

facets.legalText: The mother and the Defendant had sexual relations during the legal period of conception. (እናት እና ተከሳሽ በሕጋዊ የእርግዝና ወቅት የወሲብ ግንኙነት ነበራቸው።)
The Defendant has treated the child as his own in public and private spheres. (ተከሳሹ ልጁን በሕዝብ እና በግል እንደራሱ አድርጎታል።)

reliefs.text: Judgment declaring the Defendant is the biological father of the child. (ተከሳሹ የልጁ ባዮሎጂያዊ አባት መሆኑን የሚገልጽ ፍርድ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order for reimbursement of expenses related to birth and maintenance. (ከትውልድ እና ከጥገና ጋር የተያያዙ ወጪዎችን ለመመለስ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

app_temporary_maintenance.documentTitle: Application for Order of Provisional Maintenance (ጊዜያዊ የጥገና ትዕዛዝ ማመልከቻ)
app_temporary_maintenance.jurisdictionText: Art. 83(2) of the Revised Family Code & Art. 154 Civil Procedure Code.

facets.legalText: A main suit for divorce is currently pending between the parties. (በተዋዋይ ወገኖች መካከል የፍቺ ዋና ክስ በአሁኑ ጊዜ በመጠባበቅ ላይ ነው።)
The Applicant has no independent income to support themselves/the children during the litigation. (አመልካቹ በክርክሩ ወቅት እራሳቸውን/ልጆቻቸውን ለመደገፍ ነፃ ገቢ የላቸውም።)
The Respondent has sufficient income to provide provisional support. (ተጠሪው ጊዜያዊ ድጋፍ ለመስጠት በቂ ገቢ አለው።)

reliefs.text: Order the Respondent to pay [Amount] ETB monthly until final judgment. (ተጠሪው የመጨረሻ ፍርድ እስከሚሰጥ ድረስ በወር [መጠን] ብር እንዲከፍል ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

app_property_preservation.documentTitle: Application for Attachment and Preservation of Common Property (የጋራ ንብረትን ለማያያዝ እና ለመጠበቅ ማመልከቻ)
app_property_preservation.jurisdictionText: Art. 154 Civil Procedure Code & Art. 83 Revised Family Code.

facets.legalText: There is a reasonable apprehension that the Respondent is attempting to sell, transfer, or hide common marital assets. (ተጠሪው የጋራ የጋብቻ ንብረቶችን ለመሸጥ፣ ለማስተላለፍ ወይም ለመደበቅ እየሞከረ ነው የሚል ምክንያታዊ ስጋት አለ።)
The property in question is common property acquired during the marriage. (በጥያቄ ውስጥ ያለው ንብረት በጋብቻ ወቅት የተገኘ የጋራ ንብረት ነው።)

reliefs.text: Order restraining the Respondent from transferring or selling specific assets. (ተጠሪው የተወሰኑ ንብረቶችን ከማስተላለፍ ወይም ከመሸጥ እንዲቆጠብ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order freezing the joint bank accounts pending final partition. (የመጨረሻው ክፍፍል እስከሚጠናቀቅ ድረስ የጋራ የባንክ ሂሳቦችን እንዲታገዱ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

app_protective_order.documentTitle: Application for Urgent Protective Order (አስቸኳይ የመከላከያ ትዕዛዝ ማመልከቻ)
app_protective_order.jurisdictionText: Art. 154 Civil Procedure Code (Inherent Power) & Criminal Code References.

facets.legalText: The Applicant faces immediate physical danger from the Respondent. (አመልካቹ ከተጠሪው ወዲያውኑ አካላዊ አደጋ ይደርስበታል።)
The harm to the Applicant if the order is not granted outweighs any inconvenience to the Respondent. (ትዕዛዙ ካልተሰጠ በአመልካቹ ላይ የሚደርሰው ጉዳት በተጠሪው ላይ ከሚደርሰው ማንኛውም ችግር ይበልጣል።)

reliefs.text: Order the Respondent to temporarily vacate the matrimonial home. (ተጠሪው የጋብቻ ቤቱን ለጊዜው እንዲለቅ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order restraining the Respondent from coming within [Distance] meters of the Applicant. (ተጠሪው ከአመልካቹ [ርቀት] ሜትር ርቀት ውስጥ እንዳይመጣ የሚከለክል ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

family_post_judgment_partition.documentTitle: Application for Liquidation and Partition of Common Property (የጋራ ንብረትን ለማፍሰስ እና ለመከፋፈል ማመልከቻ)
family_post_judgment_partition.jurisdictionText: Art. 85 & 90 of the Revised Family Code and Art. 219 of the Civil Procedure Code (Execution Proceedings).

facets.legalText: This Honorable Court has already rendered a judgment dissolving the marriage between the parties under this file number. (ይህ የተከበረ ፍርድ ቤት በዚህ የፋይል ቁጥር በተዋዋይ ወገኖች መካከል ያለውን ጋብቻ የሚፈርስ ፍርድ ቀደም ሲል ሰጥቷል።)
Issues regarding child custody and maintenance have already been adjudicated. (የልጅ የማሳደግ እና የጥገና ጉዳዮች ቀደም ሲል ተወስነዋል።)
The parties acquired movable and immovable property during the existence of the marriage which constitutes Common Property. (ተዋዋይ ወገኖች በጋብቻው ወቅት የጋራ ንብረት የሆነውን ተንቀሳቃሽ እና የማይንቀሳቀስ ንብረት አግኝተዋል።)
The property is currently in the sole possession/control of the Respondent/Applicant. (ንብረቱ በአሁኑ ጊዜ በተጠሪው/አመልካቹ ብቸኛ ይዞታ/ቁጥጥር ሥር ነው።)

group_3.title: Restitution of Personal Property (Pre-Partition) (የግል ንብረትን መመለስ (ቅድመ-ክፍፍል))

facets.legalText: The Applicant possesses proof of personal property owned prior to the marriage or acquired by succession/donation, which must be withdrawn before partition. (አመልካቹ ከጋብቻ በፊት የነበረውን ወይም በውርስ/በስጦታ ያገኘውን የግል ንብረት ማረጋገጫ ያለው ሲሆን ይህም ከክፍፍል በፊት መውጣት አለበት።)
The parties are unable to agree on the value or mode of partition of the assets. (ተዋዋይ ወገኖች በንብረቶቹ ዋጋ ወይም ክፍፍል ሁኔታ ላይ መስማማት አልቻሉም።)
The complexity of the assets (e.g., business shares, real estate) requires professional valuation. (የንብረቶቹ ውስብስብነት (ለምሳሌ የንግድ ድርሻዎች፣ ሪል እስቴት) ሙያዊ ግምገማ ይጠይቃል።)

reliefs.text: Order the appointment of a court-verified expert/liquidator to inventory and value the common property. (የጋራ ንብረቱን ለመመዝገብ እና ለመገምገም በፍርድ ቤት የተረጋገጠ ባለሙያ/አጣሪ እንዲሾም ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order the restitution/withdrawal of the Applicant's personal property [List Items] prior to partition. (ከክፍፍል በፊት የአመልካቹን የግል ንብረት [ዕቃዎችን ይዘርዝሩ] እንዲመለስ/እንዲወጣ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order the remaining common property be divided equally (50/50) between the parties. (የቀረው የጋራ ንብረት በተዋዋይ ወገኖች መካከል በእኩል (50/50) እንዲከፋፈል ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order the sale by auction of indivisible property and the division of the proceeds. (የማይከፋፈል ንብረትን በጨረታ እንዲሸጥ እና ገቢው እንዲከፋፈል ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

succession_heirship_declaration.documentTitle: Application for Declaration of Heirship (የወራሽነት ማረጋገጫ ማመልከቻ)
succession_heirship_declaration.jurisdictionText: Art. 996 of the Civil Code & Civil Procedure Code.

partyTitles.applicant: Applicant / Interested Parties (አመልካች / ፍላጎት ያላቸው ወገኖች)

facets.legalText: The Deceased, [Name], passed away on [Date] at [Place]. (ሟቹ፣ [ስም]፣ በ [ቀን] በ [ቦታ] ከዚህ ዓለም በሞት ተለይቷል።)
The Applicants are the children/descendants of the deceased. (አመልካቾች የሟቹ ልጆች/ዘሮች ናቸው።)
The Deceased left no will, necessitating an intestate succession. (ሟቹ ኑዛዜ አልተወም፣ ይህም ያለ ኑዛዜ ውርስን አስፈላጊ ያደርገዋል።)
Three witnesses are present to testify that the Applicants are the only known heirs. (አመልካቾች ብቸኛ የታወቁ ወራሾች መሆናቸውን ለመመስከር ሦስት ምስክሮች ቀርበዋል።)

reliefs.text: Judgment declaring the Applicants as the sole legal heirs of the Deceased. (አመልካቾችን የሟቹ ብቸኛ ሕጋዊ ወራሾች መሆናቸውን የሚገልጽ ፍርድ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order the issuance of a Certificate of Heirship. (የወራሽነት ማረጋገጫ ሰርተፍኬት እንዲሰጥ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

succession_probate_will.documentTitle: Application for Probate of Will (የኑዛዜ ማጽደቅ ማመልከቻ)

facets.legalText: The Deceased left a valid will dated [Date]. (ሟቹ በ [ቀን] የተጻፈ ሕጋዊ ኑዛዜ ትቷል።)
The will was read in the presence of four witnesses and the Registrar. (ኑዛዜው በአራት ምስክሮች እና በሬጅስትራሩ ፊት ተነቧል።)
The will is entirely written, dated, and signed by the hand of the deceased. (ኑዛዜው ሙሉ በሙሉ በሟቹ እጅ የተጻፈ፣ ቀን የተሰጠው እና የተፈረመ ነው።)

reliefs.text: Judgment declaring the Will to be valid and the true last wish of the Deceased. (ኑዛዜው ሕጋዊ እና የሟቹ እውነተኛ የመጨረሻ ፍላጎት መሆኑን የሚገልጽ ፍርድ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order confirming the Petitioner as the Executor of the will. (አመልካቹን የኑዛዜው ፈጻሚ መሆኑን የሚያረጋግጥ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

succession_partition_estate.documentTitle: Application for Partition of Hereditary Estate (የውርስ ንብረት ክፍፍል ማመልከቻ)

facets.legalText: The parties have been legally declared as co-heirs. (ተዋዋይ ወገኖች በሕጋዊ መንገድ እንደ አብሮ ወራሾች ታውጇል።)
The debts of the estate have been paid, and the assets are ready for division. (የንብረቱ እዳዎች ተከፍለዋል፣ እና ንብረቶቹ ለክፍፍል ዝግጁ ናቸው።)
The Co-heirs cannot agree on a voluntary division of the assets. (አብሮ ወራሾቹ በንብረቶቹ በፈቃደኝነት ክፍፍል ላይ መስማማት አልቻሉም።)

reliefs.text: Order the physical division of the property in kind among the heirs. (ንብረቱን በአይነት በወራሾች መካከል እንዲከፋፈል ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
Order the sale of the property and division of proceeds (if division in kind is impossible). (ንብረቱን በሽያጭ እንዲሸጥ እና ገቢው እንዲከፋፈል ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ (በአይነት ክፍፍል የማይቻል ከሆነ)።)

app_appoint_liquidator.documentTitle: Application for Appointment of Liquidator (የአጣሪ ሹመት ማመልከቻ)

facets.legalText: The estate involves complex debts and multiple assets requiring professional management. (ንብረቱ ሙያዊ አስተዳደር የሚጠይቁ ውስብስብ እዳዎች እና በርካታ ንብረቶችን ያካትታል።)
The will did not nominate an executor, or the heirs cannot agree on one. (ኑዛዜው ፈጻሚ አልሾመም፣ ወይም ወራሾቹ በአንድ ላይ መስማማት አልቻሉም።)

reliefs.text: Order the appointment of a neutral Liquidator to administer the estate. (ንብረቱን ለማስተዳደር ገለልተኛ አጣሪ እንዲሾም ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)

app_seal_estate.documentTitle: Application for Affixing of Seals (የማሸጊያ ማመልከቻ)
app_seal_estate.jurisdictionText: Art. 946 of the Civil Code & Civil Procedure Code.

facets.legalText: There is an imminent risk that movables or documents may be removed or hidden. (ተንቀሳቃሽ ንብረቶች ወይም ሰነዶች ሊወገዱ ወይም ሊደበቁ የሚችሉበት አስቸኳይ አደጋ አለ።)
There are minor heirs whose interests require protection. (ጥበቃ የሚያስፈልጋቸው አካለ መጠን ያልደረሱ ወራሾች አሉ።)

reliefs.text: Order the court registrar to affix official seals on the deceased's property/safe. (የፍርድ ቤቱ ሬጅስትራር በሟቹ ንብረት/ካዝና ላይ ኦፊሴላዊ ማህተሞችን እንዲያደርግ ትዕዛዝ እንዲሰጥ።)
